Neck manipulation should only be performed by licensed healthcare professionals such as physical therapists, chiropractors, or massage therapists with proper training. Improper neck manipulation can lead to serious injuries including nerve damage, vertebral artery damage, or even paralysis.

If someone is experiencing neck pain, they should consult with a healthcare professional for proper assessment and treatment.
